Setting the Reference Point: 65% of its historic maximum of natural product yield.

Developing the Model: Desalination from sea water was assessed for this goal. The status of this goal is calculated as the ratio of the yield of desalination and a target yield. A Desalination Sustainability was also developed and incorporated.
Setting the Reference Point: The target desalination yield set by the Israel Water Authority for year 2020.
Other Considerations: The collection and trade in natural resources, such as aquarium fishes and corals are prohibited by law in Israel, but Israel relies heavily on sea water desalination to provide drinking water for over half the households. Therefore, desalination was incorporated into the index for this goal.
